recipes.name: Masala Oats (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Roast oats, sauté vegetables with spices, add water, and cook until thick.

recipes.name: Ragi Dosa (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Mix flours with water to form batter, ferment overnight, cook thin crispy dosas on a pan.

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook onions and tomatoes with spices, blend into a smooth sauce, add paneer cubes and cream, simmer for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Vegetable Pulao (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Fry vegetables in ghee with spices, add rice and water, cook until done.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices, cook rice separately, layer chicken and rice, steam together.

recipes.name: Chole (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook chickpeas, sauté onion and tomato with spices, mix and simmer.

recipes.name: Fruit Chaat (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Chop fruits, sprinkle lemon juice and spices, mix well.

recipes.name: Veg Sandwich (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Layer veggies and cheese between slices of bread and serve.

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Make dough, shape into balls, fry, and soak in sugar syrup.

recipes.name: Kheer (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook rice in milk, add sugar and cardamom, garnish with nuts.
